_sText:
ZM_2337 after more than 1 year of work i finished this map. it took me so long be cause i was interupted by the Criminal Investigation Department, after this i had no fun to make maps, but slowly i decided to make a new zombie map and here it is. It was hard to make it, i had to make a lot of new models, than to texture them and to compile for the source engine, the compile times were also very long on my old machine, until i build me a new pc. I also had trouble with the Hammer Editor, there were much compile errors because of the size of the map, it was huge i had to optimize it and to convert some brushes into models and this process took me time, at least i was able to compile it without any bugs, but than suddenly the skybox stopped working, i didn't knew how to fix it and i stopped this project for monthes. Yesterday i found out that the skybox bug is caused by the 3D SKYBOX, i don't know if anybody had this error (the skybox appears like the nodraw texture, and it looks horrible) but well i deleted it and it worked.
=========================================================================== all custom models were made by me in this map only the pine trees and the bushes were from DODS i hope you enjoy this map
